effect.diamond_pearl: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP at the end of each turn. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.platinum: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP at the end of each turn. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP at the end of each turn. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends. This effect is passed on by baton pass.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP each turn.
short_effect.platinum: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP each turn.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP each turn.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP on every turn.
flavor_text.platinum: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP on every turn.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP on every turn.
